short_summary: Maintenance contract for Breathing Air System and Compressed Air System
description: The successful vendor will maintain the Breathing Air System and Compressed Air System, including repairs, replacements, and other activities necessary to ensure the air systems are in proper working order. This contract aims to provide skilled labour, tools, equipment, supervision, and material to maintain the air systems.
duration_in_months: It is anticipated that one (1) firm will be issued a standing offer. The period of the Standing Offer will be for a five (5) year period.
full_summary:
## Document Description

**Reference:** WS4256401257
**Title:** Breathing Air System and Compressed Air System Maintenance
**Location:** Public Health Agency of Canada (PHAC), Winnipeg, Manitoba

## Tender Details

* **Solicitation Number:** WS4256401257
* **Publication Date:** October 31, 2023
* **Tender Closing Date:** November 30, 2023, at 14:00 EST
* **Contracting Entity:** Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* **End User Entity:** Public Health Agency of Canada (PHAC)

## Service Overview

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) invites bids to establish a five-year Standing Offer for Breathing Air System and Compressed Air System Maintenance services at Public Health Agency of Canada (PHAC) facilities in Winnipeg, Manitoba.

## Requirements

The successful firm will be responsible for providing skilled licensed labor, tools, equipment, supervision, and materials necessary for the repair and maintenance of the breathing air system components and various building air compressors. Services will be provided on an "as required" basis.

## Stand Offer Period

One (1) firm is anticipated to be issued a standing offer, valid for a period of five (5) years.

## Eligibility Criteria

Please note that the request for standing offer is open to all qualified suppliers.

## Notice and Instructions

The full notice and instructions can be obtained from the Government of Canada's Tender and Solicitation Activity website: <https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/17864610?extsite=MTc4NjQ2MTBfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==>

Please submit all required supporting documentation and bid submissions by 14:00 EST on November 30, 2023. Bids submitted after this time will be deemed non-responsive.

## Important Dates

* **Publication Date:** October 31, 2023
* **Tender Closing Date:** November 30, 2023, at 14:00 EST
* **Start Date of Contract:** January 1, 2024

Please ensure that you adhere to the above details and instructions to avoid any complications with your bid submission. If you have any questions or concerns, please contact Mike Fagan at mike.fagan@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca.
